item.title: PhD Thesis: Computational Models of Learning and Representations in the Hippocampal Formation
RatInABox, a toolkit for modelling locomotion and neuronal activity in continuous environments
item.description: This paper documents and motivates the RatInABox package, used for modellign locomotion and neural activity.
